price: Ele dirá: "Senhor meu! Por que me ressuscitaste cego, enquanto, com efeito, era vidente?"
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ لِمَ حَشَرۡتَنِيٓ أَعۡمَىٰ وَقَدۡ كُنتُ بَصِيرٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi lima ḥashartanī aʿmā waqad kuntu baṣīran
